results.title: Increased leukotriene concentration in submandibular glands from rats with experimental periodontitis.
results.text_hl: On the other hand, the presence of @CHEMICAL_cysteinyl_leukotriene @CHEMICAL_MESH:C112381 @@@cysteinyl-leukotrienes@@@ in the incubation medium induced mucin release from submandibular glands. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ diminished by 24% (P < 0.05), the increase in @CHEMICAL_cysteinyl_leukotriene @CHEMICAL_MESH:C112381 @@@cysteinyl-leukotrienes@@@ observed in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Busch L, Miozza V, Sterin-Borda L, Borda E. Increased leukotriene concentration in submandibular glands from rats with experimental periodontitis. Inflamm Res. 2009 Jul;58(7):423-30. PMID: 19347252
